markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Shoony Shovel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=635)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 69</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ornate, compact shovel has a golden handle wrapped with beautiful crimson [bulette](/Monsters.aspx?ID=61) leather. Its silver head never gets dirty or worn no matter how much you use it. Its true magic, however, is in its ability to dig on its own.

<document level="2" id="action-489" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Shoony Shovel
